title: Pushpavalli
overview: Pushpavalli was supposed to finish her Food Science degree and marry a Brahmin man that her mother approved of. All that changed after meeting the charming Nikhil Rao. After secretly following him to Bangalore, she juggles working at a children's library, dealing with her unpredictable landlady, all the while trying to convince herself that it's not stalking if you know the person, right?
